properties.description: Los tutoriales de Taxi anteriores (Mod 8) Cargaban Taxi como Null porque los nombres de las columnas estaban errados

content.query:
-- La Tabla Taxi se cre√≥ con puros Nulls en los tutoriales anteriores...
-- Los nombres de las columnas estaban errados

USE [ExternalBlobTable];
GO

IF (EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'Taxi')) BEGIN
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE Taxi
END
GO

IF (EXISTS
    (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats 
    WHERE name = 'ParquetFormat')) BEGIN
    DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ParquetFormat
END
GO

IF (EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'nyctlc')) BEGIN
    DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyctlc
END
GO


----------------------------------
-- CREATION
----------------------------------

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyctlc
WITH ( LOCATION = 'https://azureopendatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/nyctlc/')
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ParquetFormat WITH (  FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET );
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Taxi (
    --vendor_id VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2, 
    vendorID VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2, 
    --pickup_datetime DATETIME2, 
    tpepPickupDateTime DATETIME2,
    --dropoff_datetime DATETIME2,
    tpepDropoffDateTime DATETIME2,
    --passenger_count INT,
    passengerCount INT,
    --trip_distance FLOAT,
    tripDistance FLOAT,
    --fare_amount FLOAT,
    fareAmount FLOAT,
    --tip_amount FLOAT,
    tipAmount FLOAT,
    --tolls_amount FLOAT,
    tollsAmount FLOAT,
    --total_amount FLOAT
    totalAmount FLOAT
) WITH (
         LOCATION = 'yellow/puYear=*/puMonth=*/*.parquet',
         DATA_SOURCE = nyctlc,
         FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat
);

GO
SELECT TOP 100 * FROM Taxi
